17  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String, java.lang.String> map = new java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>();
18  
19  print(putAt0(map, "1", "6"));
20  print(putAt0(map, 2, "7"));

24  print(map.get(2));

29  org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.DefaultGroovyMethods.putAt(foo, "a", 2);

31

33  print(org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.DefaultGroovyMethods.getAt(foo, "4"));

47  private static <K, V, Value extends V>Value putAt0(java.util.Map<K, V> propOwner, K key, Value value) {
48  propOwner.put(key, value);
49  return value;
50  }
51  private static <Value>Value putAt1(java.lang.Object propOwner, java.lang.String property, Value newValue) {
52  org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.DefaultGroovyMethods.putAt(propOwner, property, newValue);
